string.name: _forceframerate
string.tiptext: Render at the specified frame rate

folder.name: FSCommand2
folder.tiptext: Used to access mobile phone's features

string.name: Escape
string.tiptext: Encodes a string in URL format

string.name: ExtendBacklightDuration
string.tiptext: Set Backlight duration for a specified period of time

string.name: FullScreen
string.tiptext: Sets the size of the display area to be used for rendering

string.name: GetBatteryLevel
string.tiptext: Returns the current battery level

string.name: GetDateDay
string.tiptext: Returns the day of the current date

string.name: GetDateMonth
string.tiptext: Returns the month of the current date

string.name: GetDateWeekday
string.tiptext: Returns the numeric value of the name of the day of the current date

string.name: GetDateYear
string.tiptext: Returns the numeric value of the year of the current date

string.name: GetDevice
string.tiptext: Identifies the mobile phone on which Flash is running

string.name: GetDeviceID
string.tiptext: Sets a parameter that represents the unique identifier of the mobile phone

string.name: GetFreePlayerMemory
string.tiptext: Returns the amount of memory in kilobytes available to Flash Lite

string.name: GetLanguage
string.tiptext: Sets a parameter that identifies the language used by the mobile phone

string.name: GetLocaleLongDate
string.tiptext: Sets a parameter to a string representing the current date in long form

string.name: GetLocaleShortDate
string.tiptext: Sets a parameter to a string representing the current date in abbreviated form

string.name: GetLocaleTime
string.tiptext: Sets a parameter to a string representing the current time

string.name: GetMaxBatteryLevel
string.tiptext: Returns the current battery level

string.name: GetMaxSignalLevel
string.tiptext: Returns the maximum signal strength level

string.name: GetMaxVolumeLevel
string.tiptext: Returns the maximum volume level of the mobile phone

string.name: GetNetworkConnectStatus
string.tiptext: Returns a value indicating the current network connection status

string.name: GetNetworkConnectionName
string.tiptext: Name of the active or default network

string.name: GetNetworkGeneration
string.tiptext: Generation of the current network

string.name: GetNetworkName
string.tiptext: Sets a parameter to the name of the current network

string.name: GetNetworkRequestStatus
string.tiptext: Returns a value indicating the status of the most recent HTTP request

string.name: GetNetworkStatus
string.tiptext: Returns a value indicating the network status of the phone

string.name: GetPlatform
string.tiptext: Identifies the current platform

string.name: GetPowerSource
string.tiptext: Returns a value indicating if the power source is battery or external

string.name: GetSignalLevel
string.tiptext: Returns the current signal strength

string.name: GetTimeHours
string.tiptext: Returns the hour of the current time of day, based on a 24-hour clock

string.name: GetTimeMinutes
string.tiptext: Returns the minute of the current time of day

string.name: GetTimeSeconds
string.tiptext: Returns the second of the current time of day

string.name: GetTimeZoneOffset
string.tiptext: Sets a parameter comparing the local time zone and the UTC

string.name: GetTotalPlayerMemory
string.tiptext: Returns the total amount of memory in kilobytes

string.name: GetVolumeLevel
string.tiptext: Returns the current volume level of the mobile phone

string.name: ResetSoftKeys
string.tiptext: Resets the softkeys to their original settings

string.name: SetFocusRectColor
string.tiptext: Set the color of the focus rectangle

string.name: SetInputTextType
string.tiptext: Specifies the mode in which the input text field should be opened

string.name: SetQuality
string.tiptext: Sets the quality of the rendering of the animation

string.name: SetSoftKeys
string.tiptext: Used to remap the left and right softkeys of the mobile phones

string.name: StartVibrate
string.tiptext: Starts the phone's vibration

string.name: StopVibrate
string.tiptext: Stops the phone's vibration

string.name: Unescape
string.tiptext: Decodes a string in URL format

string.name: Quit
string.tiptext: Causes Flash Lite to stop playback and exit

folder.name: FSCommand
folder.tiptext: Used to access mobile phone's features

action.name: Launch
action.tiptext: Starts another application on the mobile phone

folder.name: Capabilities
folder.tiptext: Used to determine mobile phone's capabilities

string.name: _capCompoundSound
string.tiptext: Indicates whether Flash Lite can process compound sound data

string.name: _capEmail
string.tiptext: Indicates whether Flash Lite can send e-mail messages

string.name: _capMMS
string.tiptext: Indicates whether Flash Lite can send MMS messages

string.name: _capSMS
string.tiptext: Indicates whether Flash Lite can send SMS messages

string.name: _capMFi
string.tiptext: Indicates whether the device can play MFi sound

string.name: _capMIDI
string.tiptext: Indicates whether the device can play MIDI sound

string.name: _capSMAF
string.tiptext: Indicates whether the device can play SMAF sound

string.name: _capMP3
string.tiptext: Indicates whether the device can play MP3 sound

string.name: _capStreamSound
string.tiptext: Indicates whether the device can play streaming sound

string.name: _capLoadData
string.tiptext: Indicates whether the host application can dynamically load data

string.name: _cap4WayKeyAS
string.tiptext: Indicates if Flash Lite executes ActionScript attached to directional keys

string.name: hasCompoundSound
string.tiptext: If true, player is capable of processing compound sound data

string.name: hasEmail
string.tiptext: If true, player is capable of sending e-mail messages

string.name: hasMMS
string.tiptext: If true, player is capable of sending MMS messages

string.name: hasSMS
string.tiptext: If true, player is capable of sending SMS messages

string.name: hasMFI
string.tiptext: If true, player is capable of playing MFI audio

string.name: hasMIDI
string.tiptext: If true, player is capable of playing MIDI audio

string.name: hasSMAF
string.tiptext: If true, player is capable of playing SMAF audio

string.name: hasDataLoading
string.tiptext: Indicates if the player is capable of dynamically loading additional data

string.name: has4WayKeyAS
string.tiptext: If true, platform has 4way key

string.name: hasMouse
string.tiptext: If true, player will send mouse related events

string.name: hasMappableSoftKeys
string.tiptext: Allows user to set soft key values and handle events from those softkeys

string.name: hasStylus
string.tiptext: If true, platform supports stylus

string.name: hasCMIDI
string.tiptext: If true, platform supports CMIDI sound

string.name: softKeyCount
string.tiptext: Number of soft keys supported by the platform

string.name: hasSharedObjects
string.tiptext: If true, platform can access Mobile Shared Objects

string.name: hasQWERTYKeyboard
string.tiptext: If true, platform has QWERTY keyboard

string.name: audioMIMETypes
string.tiptext: Array of MIME types supported by the device's audio codecs

string.name: imageMIMETypes
string.tiptext: Array of MIME types supported by the device's image codecs

string.name: videoMIMETypes
string.tiptext: Array of MIME types supported by the device's video codecs

string.name: MIMETypes
string.tiptext: Array of all the MIME types supported

string.name: screenOrientation
string.tiptext: Current screen orientation

string.name: $version
string.tiptext: Contains the version number of Flash Lite

folder.name: Date
folder.tiptext: Class that helps you work with dates and times

string.name: getLocaleLongDate
string.tiptext: Current date in long form

string.name: getLocaleShortDate
string.tiptext: Current date in abbreviated form

string.name: getLocaleTime
string.tiptext: String representing the current time

folder.name: Locale
folder.tiptext: Class that controls how a multilanguage text is displayed in a SWF file

string.name: addDelayedInstance
string.tiptext: Adds the instance and string ID for later use

string.name: addXMLPath
string.tiptext: Adds the language code and language paths for later use

string.name: checkXMLStatus
string.tiptext: Returns true if the XML is loaded, false otherwise

string.name: initialize
string.tiptext: Determines the language to use and begins XML loading

string.name: loadLanguageXML
string.tiptext: Loads the specified language XML file

string.name: loadString
string.tiptext: Returns the string value associated with the given string ID in the current language

string.name: setDefaultLang
string.tiptext: Sets the default language code

string.name: setLoadCallback
string.tiptext: Sets the call back function that will be called after the XML file is loaded

string.name: play
string.tiptext: Starts playback of a video

string.name: close
string.tiptext: Stops playback of the video and frees memory of object

string.name: stop
string.tiptext: Stops playback of the video

string.name: pause
string.tiptext: Pauses playback of the video

string.name: resume
string.tiptext: Resumes playback of the video

folder.tiptext: Event handlers of the Video class

string.name: onStatus
string.tiptext: Indicates status or error condition
